title: Eradicating Peste des Petits Ruminants Globally

tasks.task: Conduct a global campaign to eradicate a disease affecting small ruminants.
subtasks: Monitor disease prevalence in infected countries.
Implement targeted vaccination programs in affected regions.
Surveillance in neighboring non-infected countries to prevent spread.
Assist free countries in maintaining disease-free status.
Vaccinate small ruminants at a low cost (1 dose < $0.10).
Educate stakeholders on the importance of disease prevention.
Address the socio-economic impact on women in developing countries.
Perform cost-benefit analysis to justify investment in vaccination.
Eradicate the disease by 2030 through sustained program implementation.
